text: Mou Shantao (; born 1 March 1990), also erroneously listed as Mu Shantao, is a Chinese footballer currently playing as a defender for Villarrobledo. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Guizhou Hengfeng |2013 |China League One |?||?||1Appearances in the Chinese FA Cup||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||1||0 |- |rowspan="3"|Shenzhen |2014 |rowspan="2"|China League One |9||0||1||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||10||0 |- |2015 |12||0||1||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||13||0 |- ! colspan=2 | Total !21!!0!!2!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!23!!0 |- |Henan Jianye |2016 |Chinese Super League |5||0||1Appearances in the Chinese FA Cup||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||5||0 |- |rowspan="4"|Inner Mongolia Zhongyou |2017 |rowspan="3"|China League One |15||1||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||15||1 |- |2018 |7||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||7||0 |- |2019 |3||0||1||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||4||0 |- ! colspan=2 | Total !25!!1!!1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!26!!1 |- |Villarrobledo |2019–20 |Segunda División B |2||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||2||0 |- ! colspan=3 | Career total !53!!1!!5!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!58!!1 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese footballers Category:Chinese expatriate footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Guizhou Hengfeng F.C. players Category:Shenzhen F.C. players Category:Henan Jianye F.C. players Category:Inner Mongolia Zhongyou F.C. players Category:Segunda División B players Category:Chinese expatriate sportspeople in Spain Category:Expatriate footballers in Spain
